description: A clean, organized, and functional bathroom is essential for personal hygiene and a smooth start to the day.
sentences: Good ventilation is critical to prevent mold and mildew.
Maximize storage with cabinets, shelves, or over-the-toilet units.
Regular cleaning is non-negotiable for hygiene.
Ensure you have good task lighting around the mirror.
Keep a separate stock of toiletries so you never run out unexpectedly.
dos: Squeegee the shower walls after use to prevent soap scum buildup.
Wash bath mats and towels regularly.
Use trays or containers to group items on the counter.
Fix leaky faucets promptly to conserve water.
donts: Don't store medications in the medicine cabinet; the humidity can damage them.
Avoid using harsh, abrasive cleaners on delicate surfaces.
Don't flush anything other than toilet paper.
Don't let clutter pile up on the countertop.
